name: Mayhem in Botopia
description:
(Made for LOWRESJAM2021, 64x64 resolution, Sega Master System Colour Palette, emulation of Sega Master System FM chip used for music/sounds.)

 In a future not so far away, the remote robot haven planet of Botopia is experiencing heavy unrest.  As the latest in spider drone technology, it's up to you to lay down the law and in doing so, get a high score!

Move with WASD.

Aim with the mouse.

Left click to shoot stunning bullets at enemies.

Right click to arrest enemies when you're close enough to do so.

Alt + enter (or F4) to switch between windowed and fullscreen mode.
